text: SCOTT WARD can’t sleep. He scowls in defiance at the gold midday sun scorching through the blinds. Plain but handso with an ‘I’m in charge here’ buzzcut. A thoughtful man, b no genius, he’s stymied by the daylight. We note the ANGR BRUISING on his 200-pushups-a-day chest. Ward tries to fall back asleep. No dice. He shifts his weight and peels his Glock off his sweaty back. Sighs and starts counting the cracks in his bedroom ceiling...

EXT. LIQUOR STORE - WARD'S FLASHBACK -—- DAY A GANGBANGER in a black hoodie bursts out the door with a shotgun! WARD stands there in LAPD uniform. Reaches for h holster -- Breaks leather. Steps into a textbook shooting stance. Muzzle coming on target. Too Late... The GANGBANGER spins aims fires -- KABOOM!
Ward gasps awake. His fingertips skim the ugly green and purple bruises on his chest. I’m still alive...

Ward shuffles into the kitchen -- Sees SHERRI, his age, inspecting dishes in the sink, looking for the easiest on wash. Pretty in a champagne room kind of way. She has an air of entitlement, things should’ve been easier for her. The tension between them is palpable. Ward grabs a huge b of Cheerios, fills a plastic bowl. Without looking up:
There’s a fairy in the bird feeder again. Ward sighs. Gets the milk from the fridge. Smells it. Expired. Pours it anyway.

It’s the same fuckin’ one, too. Isn't it? Cause you didn’t kill it last time. Ward steels himself as he tamps cornflakes into sour mil He's been over her shit for a long time -- His tone immediately counters her aggression, mellow, even...
I thought you were out looking for a job.
Oh. Right. Of course. Of course you'd bring that up.
Yesterday you indicated you would be actively looking for employment. We had a plan, a timeline. And I’m concerned-—
--Don’t. Don’t do that.
Do what?
Your Zen cop ‘I'm talking to a crazy person’ voice you do.
.--I'm trying to not escalate...
For your information, I had an interview this morning.
Okay. That’s good.
I don’t need you to tell me it’s good. I won’t fuckin’ get it.
How do you know?
Because I can tell. Okay? The woman was a snotty bitch.
Keep at it. Your next interviewer might be a man. You can shake your six thousand dollar bolt-on-tits at him.

Way to de-escalate asshole. We all know I can make more money than your broke ass ever will dancing. So fuck you. Sophie’s staying at mom’s tonight. You gotta give her a ride. And get the fuckin’ fairy. Kill it this time. Pussy. She grabs her keys and charges out of there. EXT. WARD’S HOUSE - FRONT YARD - DAY Ward peers through the bars of his shitty Craftsman in So Central LA. Gangster THUMP emanates from the house next door. Two Low Riders on the lawn, cabled together. HOMIES solemnly gathered around open hoods. Ward slides the Glock in his pocket. Grabs a broom. Steps out into the sunlight -- His neighbor MIGUEL clocks him.
Good afternoon officer. We didn’t wake you up? He salutes. Ward salutes back, on a mission, not slowing down...
No, never. Because bass doesn’t carry at all. You know that’s bad for the grass. The cars.
Grass grows back. How’s your old lady?
Save up your lunch money and ask her yourself. The Homies sense his venom and wince -- Damnnnn.
Yo, that fairy in your bird feeder’s been up in my pad eating my dog food. I’m a call the city.

I am the city. Motherfucker’s about to go to Fairy Heaven. Ward approaches the bird feeder slowly. A dead pigeon la beneath it -- Badly burnt. Ward stops and thinks. He doesn’t need this shit. Raises the broom... The Homies look on, expectant, as they slowly back up... Ward gently pokes the bird feeder. Nothing. THEN: The FAIRY bursts out SCREECHING at him! A sparrow- sized hybrid of lemur and insect. It HISSES like vermin..
Aw shit. Ring the bell. It’s on. Ward jabs it with the broom -- It flings a handful of spa at him!

Ah! Fuck! The Homies erupt into laughter. Ward ignores them, locked onto his enemy. He fakes left, spins, swats it against th house with a thud -- The Fairy drops to the ground, HISSI helpless, injured...

That's it right there. LAPD style. Now watch him finish off the little homie. Ward advancing slowly, clearly pitying the fairy -- It th sparks again -- Ward looks away and brings down the broom with finality -- He's sprayed with purple blood. This gets the expected eruption from the onlookers...
Ward returns and regards his forgotten bowl of soggy cere His mind tumbles, something washes over his face. He's suddenly somewhere else...

Ward is on his back next to the front tire of his black a white. He’s stunned. The buckshot in his vest smoking. Th Gangbanger steps around the corner of the vehicle. Presse the shotgun to Ward’s forehead -- His eyes locked onto th face of holy motherfucking death itself. A face we don’t to_see yet...  CLICK. The shotgun is jammed. The Gangbanger takes off running. ECU WARD -- Gritting his teeth in rage...
He shakes his head, wiping his face...
Daddy! INT. WARD'S HOUSE - SOPHIA’S BEDROOM - DAY Ward's little daughter SOPHIA tries to cram a mound of stuffed animals into her backpack. Ward sits on her bed, eating a banana.
They don’t fit.
So just take a couple. You’re only going to Grandma’s for one night.
If I only take two the rest will miss them.
You're very considerate. But what about like clothes and toothbrushes and socks and stuff?
Daddy I’m only going for one night. Ward laughs. Then...
Are you in trouble?
Am I in trouble? Did mom say something?
Mom said you and Nick are in trouble because Nick did something dumb. Ward makes a mental note -- Total information lockdown ti with Sherry. Before he can craft a response...
Kayla at school says orcs do dumb stuff because they’re not as smart as people. Did Nick get you in trouble? I don’t want you be in trouble. Ward speaks carefully.
Orcs aren’t dumb. Okay? All the races are different than us. And being different doesn’t make them smarter or dumber. They’re just like us. Okay? Everyone just wants to get along and be happy.
Can elves really talk to dragons?
Not unless they go to the zoo.
Kayla says--
--you gotta stop listening to Kayla. Kayla sounds like trouble.
No, Kayla never gets in trouble.

Not yet. Being so judgemental won't do Kayla any favors in life. Look. Don’t let anyone tell you what to think. Treat everyone nice and they'll treat you nice. Suddenly a crash outside -- KATHUNK! -- Ward reacts, quic gets up... EXT. WARD’S HOUSE - DAY Ward exits and sees an LAPD Black and White on his lawn.

Aw come on. What the actual fuck? NICK JAKOBY, early 30s, exits from the driver’s side with grin -- By the way -- JAKOBY'S AN ORC...  Like most ores, he’s bald with green skin, orange eyes and slightly animalistic facial features. He’s friendly and e going, but right now he’s gently on the defensive. From next
What? They put new shocks in. I was testing them on your curb.
On my curb? That makes no sense.
Your driveway’s full? door...
Hey officer, that’s bad for the grass.
Yes. Thank you. It grows back. (to Jakoby) Why are you here in our car?
I had that diversity training thing up at Elysian. Thought you were going.
I did it. You can’t run errands in a city car.
Your house is on the way to the barn. Hop in. Let’s go to work.
Hi Nick! Sophia exits with a big smile for Jakoby...
Hey Sophia, what’s up rockstar?
We're packing for grandma’s.
That’s cool.
Will you shut up, bro? I don’t want you catching days over a stupid mileage beef.
Don’t tell Nick to shut up, he’s a person too!
Enlightened kid there, Scott.
Jakoby drives. Sophia in back listening to headphones. Wa quietly seethes...
What?
This is stupid. I’m in soft clothes with my kid in the car. If we get popped.
Right. Because maybe Internal Affairs is running integrity stings on vehicle mileage this week.
You suck at sarcasm. You’re supposed to use a sarcastic tone when you're being sarcastic.
I put what, five extras miles on the car? A buck of gas. That’s a criminal violation. Bro we gotta deny everything. Delete Facebook and lawyer up.
Exactly like that. A sarcastic tone.
Dude. Is it your man-period? Did you sleep?
No. Yes. Sort of. I keep seeing that asshole who blasted me.
You gotta try melatonin. I gotta bottle in my warbag I'll flip you. Pop one an hour before bed and stay off the laptop. The screen fucks up your circadian rhythm.
Yeah, okay mom. A beat of silence. What Ward really wants to talk about bubbles agonizingly to the surface.
Nick, did you let that asshole go?
Yeah I let him go. Because that’s what I do. Dude’s who shoot my partner get a pass.
It’s me and you brother. Just me and you talking.
It’s fucked up you’d ask me that.
I saw his face, okay? He was an orc. He was clan-blood.

I don’t give a shit about clan- blood. I don’t. You’ve never came at me racial. Not once. You think I'd kick the dude who shot you loose because he’s green? Scott? Ward sighs checks his texts. Then...

I know you didn’t. But the guys on our Watch are talking mad shit. So it’s out there. Just know it’s out there. (then) If you came out on front street about it I totally wouldn’t care. Jakoby looks at Ward, with that intense open honesty he h
You would. Scott, you would.  10.
Ward hugs Sophia goodbye. SHERRI’S MOTHER looks on, while Jakoby waits with the car. Ward SEES Sophia’s crying.
Hey, Sophia, don’t cry, don’t cry.
I don’t want you to die.
Honey. I’m not going to die. I promise. Go with Grandma.
But mommy said Nick is going to get you killed. Ward can barely contain his anger.
Mommy's kidding. She says silly things sometime.

I don’t want you to be dead. I hate you being a policeman. Everybody hates policemen! Sophia twists away. Runs crying towards the house. Ward absorbs the blow for a moment. When he returns to the car Jakoby is gentle with this...
Remind me, partner, why Sherri’s not watching her tonight?
She’s got a date.
Bro. Why are you still letting her live with you?
You know why.
Sophia’s not your daughter.
Funny. Cause it sure fucking feels like she is, Nick.  11.
I’m sorry. You know what I mean. I don’t know how to be on your side when you’re not on your side. Ward angrily gets in the car...
Save me, Nick. Save me from all the ex-strippers of the world.

Solidly in the hood. A black SUV pulls up. Two Federal Agents step out in black suits. One is human, he’s all ab Gracie Ju-Jitsu and fine tailoring -- This is MONTEHUGH. The taller Agent is lithe with striking dark skin and dazzling teal eyes. LIKE MOST ELVES his features are near human, if perhaps slightly stretched. Almost too perfect, barring of course, his pointed ears -- This is KANDOMERE.
It’s, um, rustic here. I’m sure the inhabitants of this outpost have priceless knowledge to aid us on our quest. Kandomere cocks an eyebrow at him.
I apologize there are no local shops with artisanal kale smoothies and organic chicken breast in ten pound servings. Stay on task. Montehugh glares at Kandomere as they enter the station.
My gains, bruh. Never mock my gains.

Crammed and with lead paint and peeling asbestos. Kandome and Montehugh check in at the front desk. CAMERA FINDS JAKOBY -- In a nearby hallway, watching the Agents from the shadows. Nervous. Kandomere feels Jakoby’s gaze. Looks over. Jakoby is already gone.
Cops suit up to protect and serve. Ward peels the dry cleaning bag off a fresh uniform.
Hey, any of you seen my partner? HICKS, a middle aged bulldog of a man, laughs thickly.
Big green dude? Orange eyes? Not exactly a Rhodes Scholar? Why yes. I have seen your partner. BROWN, 20s, with fratboy excitability, jumps in...
Hah. You said partner with airquotes.
See, Ward’s partner is a peace officer.
Fucking outstanding. Airquotes again.
(announces loudly) Anyone have a location on our diversity hire? He likes to wander. Ward fumes. POLLARD, late 30s, with the bitter cold demea of a broken street cop, mutters this:

Cops don’t wander. Pets wander. Ward, you wanna ride with a dog, work K9. They laugh in that stupid, self congratulatory way racist always do. Ward about to explode... POLLARD (CONT’D) If I get smoked, gentlemen. Let the asshole go.
Dude. I so got you. Done.  13.
And now I say fuck you to you. You. And you.
You know what they say about clan blood. (ominously) Once for the Dark Lord, always for the Dark Lord.
How can dumb-asses like you who can’t remember your wife's birthday still have beef against a whole race of people for some shit that went down thousands of years ago?
Race of people.
Bam! Airquotes! You are the fucking master. Ward spins to about to break Brown’s neck... BANG-BANG-BANG! SERGEANT CHING, a badass intelligent fema is pounding on a locker...
Hi guys. If we’re done handing Ward ammo for his inevitable lawsuit against the Department, it’s time to drink in the Captain's wisdom.
The Cops we met sit at tables. Jakoby and Ward noticeably isolated from the “cool kids”. Jakoby whispers to Ward:
I saw feds in the building. They had an elf and everything. Think they’re here for me?
You'd be suspended already if something was up. Lay off the energy drinks.  14.
Right, man, yeah. CAPTAIN PEREZ enters...

I'd like to welcome everyone to the latest episode of “We Are All Fucked” starring the PM Watch. Mock cheers and real laughs from the boys and girls. CAPTAIN PEREZ (CONT’D) Tonight we got the trifecta. Full moon on a Friday night in a Summer heatwave. The streets will be seriously assholed-up and we’re spread thin as Royce’s comb-over. One of the officers, ROYCE, chuckles. CAPTAIN PEREZ (CONT’D) That means clear your calls fast and help your colleagues clear theirs. Get me outta this reporting period without another murder, I‘’1ll buy you all coffee. This gets a positive, serious response. As he rushes off the next thing... CAPTAIN PEREZ (CONT’D) Sergeant Ching, all yours.

Yessir! A former Marine, she snaps to with her clipboard... SERGEANT CHING (CONT’D) After I call your name, get your shotguns and radios and deploy. I don’t want to see you here unless there’s badguys under the desks. Pollard. Brown. You’re working Three-A-Four.
Shotguns and radios? When do we get the graham crackers and apple juice?  15.

I will fuck you up, Pollard. I give zero fucks how much time in grade you got. Zero fucks. Ward, Jakoby. Three-A-Nine. Gomez and the rookie with the unpronounceable Thai surname. Three-A-Six. Jakoby and Ward can’t get out of there fast enough...
Ward grinds his teeth as Jakoby drives. Jakoby cranks his bluetooth speakers to fill the silence.
Bro. No. We’re not listening to Orkish folk music.

You gonna act like a little bitch all watch? I thought Orcs were supposed to be dark motherfuckers. You need to get laid. Get a Sancha like every other cop working South Central. You got all the hoodrats chasing you.
I don’t need to get laid.
Yes you do. Humans are easy to read. Like you guys have all these little tells.
Little tells like what?
Like when you make this face... Jakoby makes a bizarre face. Ward can’t help it, starts chuckling.
What face is that? That’s not a face.
It’s the face you’re making right now. It’s a human who needs some pussy face.  16.
Sure. I see it now. Show me another human face. Jakoby makes a bizarre pouting expression.
This is when a human finds out he isn’t getting any pancakes.

(laughing now) It’s true, we do love pancakes. Ward changes the music -- A BANGING TRACK starts. The boy laugh, rolling through the hood. Its modest homes and pal trees splashed with golden late afternoon sunlight...
WE SEE brief, beautiful images of the view from their car

MUCH IS FAMILIAR -- KIDS playing football in the street. HOMELESS PEOPLE in tent cities. HISPANIC FAMILIES buying from push carts. HOOKERS selling their souls. SOME LESS SO -- A tough looking group of ORCS glares AT CAMERA from the porch. An OGRE loads an Engine Block into pick-up. A LIZARD MAN sorts bottles and cans. A dwarf wom hurries along with her groceries, walking a small dog. South Central’s as South Central always was, and is as So Central’s never been...
Three-Adam-Nine. Four fifteen man. Alameda and Jefferson. Code two. Incident two eight zero six two.
Three-Adam-Nine. Roger, show us enroute. Jakoby busts a U as Ward checks the computer for deets on call.
A bearded HOMELESS MAN, shirtless, dirty and emaciated, wildly swings a broadsword in the middle of the intersect Screaming his head off...  17.

A great cloud is coming, a great black cloud of fire! The Dark Lord grows closer every day! We may have forgotten about magic, but magic has not forgotten about us! Jakoby and Ward's cruiser glides to a stop alongside an L Sheriff's car. Alone behind the wheel is RODRIGUEZ. A goo dude and a good cop, he gives Jakoby and Ward a “wassup” tilt. The three nonplussed cops watch the show... HOMELESS MAN (CONT’D) The Dark Lord’s eyes are opening! They are opening!
Suspect’s nine feet tall, burning red eyes, black armor, flaming ax, got it.
It’s the full moon, dude.
Yep. What’s your plan Rodriguez?

My plan? Nothing. He’s on your side of the street. But he crosses that yellow line, I’m dumping him with the crowd pleaser. Rodriguez grabs his shotgun. Jakoby sighs. Grabs the microphone. Flips the console to PA mode...
(booming over the PA) Sir. Sir. Drop the sword. Drop. The. Sword.
You! The homeless man points his sword directly at Jakoby...
HOMELESS MAN (CONT’D) Two thousand years ago we fought him with swords and arrows! Now he rises again. We will fight him with bullets and bombs!
Why’re Orcs always the bad guys?  18.
Don't look at me, man. Mexicans still get shit for the Alamo. Ward's had enough -- Pops out with his Glock...
Yo. Unless you wanna die, drop the sword. Right. Fucking. Now. Wow. Ward can be a real asshole. The Man tosses the sword Drops to his knees. Shows his hands -- He knows the drill
I got him, partner. Jakoby snaps on his gloves. Approaches. Cuffs the Man. Walking him back to the cars. Rodriguez about to bail...

Real quick, eh. Gang Intel guys are sayin’ Fogteeth activity’s off the chain. And Altamira’s gangbanging like it’s 1999. Watch your backs tonight. He takes off as Jakoby stuffs the Man in back. The second he’s in the car he VOMITS...
Jakoby and Ward endure the puke smell as the Man rants.

The army of 9 races fought shoulder to shoulder to give you the world you take for granted now! Remember the old ways before the darkness returns! The clock ticks! The minute hand moves towards midnight!
Can you just chill for a sec? The Man bores into Ward's eyes with his. Low and quiet:

The Blood Moon is nigh and your test begins. Remember, the only truth is in your heart. Pass the test and thirty three seconds will be your reward.  19. Ward looks at him entranced. Snaps out of it. Looks at Jakoby -- Who's feeling the creepiness too...
Ward hoses the vomit out of the back. Captain Perez and t scary Internal Affairs Detectives -- ARKASHIAN and YAMAHA approach. All duly grim...
Where’s Jakoby?
Booking our body, sir. The IA Detectives get in Ward's space. Eye him head to to Pure intimidation. Perez looks around. Leans on the car. He can be pretty scary himself. Quietly:

The Department’s always been cutting edge. First radio cars. Helicopters. SWAT team. First to hire Orcs. We’re committed to diversity. As is Sacramento and Washington. But the politicians haven't worked the ghetto. They’re not boots on the ground like we are.
Where’s this going, sir?
The Orc who shot you is on the street because of Jakoby.
Respectfully I disagree. Jakoby did no wrong.
Do Orcs have mad hops? How many Ores are ballers?
Excuse me?
You fucking heard the Detective. How many Orcs play pro basketball?  20.
None. They’re slow. They’re heavy. That’s why half the NFL linebackers are Orcish. It’s simple physics.
I’m sorry. Who are you?
Fuck you. That’s who we are.
Okay, let’s review kids.

Resuming the backstory here -- Ward, flat on his back, st into the angry orange eyes of the Orc Gangbanger -- CLICK The Orc tosses the jammed shotgun and runs into a crowded SWAP MEET. Jakoby takes off after him...

You respond to a silent ringer and some Orc lays you out with buckshot. Jakoby foot pursues and corners shithead in a dead end alley. Then it gets mysterious. IN THE DEAD END ALLEY -- The Gangbanger charges. Knocks Jakoby down. His Glock SKITTERS across piss-soaked asphalt...
Jakoby stated dude tackles him. Disarms him. Jumps up, grabs a fire escape ladder. Evades arrest. ON THE FIRE ESCAPE -- Gangbanger kicks in a window, dives
Arkashian and Yamahara glaring at Ward...
Jakoby’s on record saying this. Signed, sealed, witnessed.
Ladder’s thirteen feet off the ground. Thirteen. We measured it. No Orc has a six foot vertical.  21.
Suspect was light on his feet, sir.
Your boy kicked loose the green fuck who blasted you. Do the math. Ward doing the math...
Jakoby was a social experiment mandated by outsiders. Clan Blood isn’t compatible with law enforcement. Problem is we can’t fire him without cause.
You're going to tie the noose that hangs him. Get him to admit it. Record him on this. Yamahara proffers a small digital recorder...
This guy’s my brother. He’s the best street cop I’ve worked with. I can’t fuck him like that.
Then you're fired. I want your badge, gun and ID. Ward REACTS...

You got a house in the hood you can’t sell. Student loans up the ass. Shacked up with a stripper and her kid. Have fun looking for work as a disgraced ex-cop. Ward stares at the recorder. At his antagonists. If looks could kill they'd all be dead...
Ward driving. Tense. He's palming the recorder.
Hey partner?
What’s up buddy?  22. Jakoby looks up from the logbook -- With that open, hones energy he has. Ward is pole axed. He can't betray him. Surreptitiously tosses the recorder out his window.
Where you wanna eat, partner?
Three-Adam-Nine. Unknown disturbance. 341 Abrams Street. Code two. Incident two eight one one five.
Three-Adam-Nine. Show us enroute. KMA.

Isolated. High walls everywhere. Barbed wire. Black iron spikes. This is Altamira Locos country. Their graffiti everywhere. Ward and Jakoby cruise slowly. Jakoby clocks LITTLE HOMIE watching them from a porch...
Spotter. There.
Hiii buddy. How old do you think he is, fifteen?
If that. This is it on the right.
They pull up to the house. It’s a 2 storey death trap. Th overgrown yard filled with junk cars garbage. Scary as fu
They should fire their landscaper.
(into mic) Three-Adam-Nine. Show me Code Six at Three Four One Abrams. Jakoby staring at the house, spooked...
What’s up? What do you see?  23.
Nothin. They exit the car -- The Little Homie has drifted over to watch them...
Why’s always kids doing the dirty work out here?
Altamira jumps ‘em in at twelve. They don’t have Hair One but they're down for life. Crossing to the house...
Sucks. Even Orc clans wait till you're fifteen before you get blooded.
Different strokes.
I don’t see it, man. Must be a California thing.
(laughing) That’s so you. That’s your catchphrase.
I don’t have a catchphrase.
Anything you don’t agree with, it’s always like “must be a California thing.”
Partner!
Fuck me! Holy shit! They scramble back to their car -- Wards sliding over the hood, Jakoby over the trunk. KABOOM! KABOOM! Shotgun fire shredding their black and white!  24.
(into radio) Three-Adam-Nine. Shots fired. Officer needs help. Three Forty One Abrams.
What the fuck, man? This is bad, this is so bad.
Easy partner. Stay in cover. KABOOM! -- The windows above them explode, spraying them glass! Ward calculates the next move...
Holy fuck! Holy shit!
Okay. Be cool. On three we’re dumping on this asshole. Just empty your mag. I’11 do the rest. One. Two... KABOOM! -- The hood is shredded. KABOOM! -- The light bar explodes...
Three! They pop up and return fire on the darkened window... BAM-BAM-BAM-BAM-BAM-BAM-BAM-BAM! -- Jakoby sprays. Ward takes careful aimed shots -- They drop back into cover. Breathing hard.
You okay?
No holes. I’m good. You okay? Ward's fine. They trade nods. Pop up again and SEE... An arm hangs from the window. Blood drips off fingertips. They got him. Now they hear a CHILD CRYING inside the hou
There's a kid in there. Ward doesn’t hesitate. Breaks cover, running...  25.
Wait for the cavalry. Scott? Fine. Fuck it. Jakoby runs to join him...
WHAM! -- The front door is kicked open -- Ward and Jakoby charge in.
Police Officers! Stay where you are, we'll find you! No reponse. Ward and Jakoby ease further in.
I smell blood. They ease forward. Tactical. Careful. Through a gloomy darkness of ratty furniture and exposed walls...
Body. Legs poke from a door frame leading into the kitchen. The partners advance and REACT...

Wh...oh shit. What is that? What is that bro? The entire top half of the dead man has been BLASTED INTO ASH, he's a blackened, charred, skeleton from the waist u A massive scorch mark on the wall... Ward stares, blinking, trying to snap himself out of shoc Jakoby isn’t doing as well.

Look. Shit dude, look. Ward turns, SEES a hole blown in the wall, into the back yard. Like a bomb went off... An ORC dead in the yard, half of him turned to stone, his other half gruesomely dead, a pistol next to him. Another dead man, blown in half, is in the kitchen. The two cops stare in awe.
Wh- what the fuck happened here?  26.
(into radio) Three-Adam-Nine. Possible Bright on scene. Nothing back from the radio...

Three-Adam-Nine. Three Four One Abrams. Possible Magic User at our location. Request additional units for a perimeter and a supervisor. His radio replies with an eerie HISS. The hair stands up the back of their necks...
Where’s the troops? Where is everyone. Then ... a noise. Both men startle. Then push further int the dark house...
Door.

Got it. Jakoby gently pushes the cracked door, it drifts open... INT. 341 ABRAMS - SHOOTER’S ROOM - DAY The SHOOTER is slumped against the window, breathing shal shotgun on the floor. Bloody. His eyes follow the cops...
Do not move. Do not move. Ward advances, kicks the gun away, eyes his wounds.
Is he staying or going dude?
Hey can you hear me? Can you hear me, man, can you..? The Shooter mutters something with his dying breath...
T'rein...Oter...T' lias o'ter...  27.
What’s he saying? That Elvish?
Yeah, it’s Old Elvish. Suddenly a FIGURE bursts out of hiding, scrambles out the door!
Shit. Grab em. Grab em. Jakoby takes off...

The figure bursts out the front door at a full run with Jakoby in hot pursuit -- Jakoby dives and tackles the fig knocking it to the ground... WE SEE it’s a young ELF GIRL, screaming, frantic. Fightin like a banshee. Clutching something to her chest -- She snaps at Jakoby...
Fuck, she’s trying to bite me! Get her hands she’s got something! Ward rushes out to help restrain the kid. She’s clearly trying to keep something away from them.
What’s she got? What’s she holding!? Ward and Jakoby pin her down -- AN ARC OF PURPLE ELECTRIC

head_text.subj: BLASTS UP AND STRIKES THE POWER LINES

text: Jakoby and Ward jump back, drawing their guns. The little girl cowers, drops what she’s holding...
Shit! ... Shit! Both cops stare in shock -- At the reedy white piece of w with a black handle and gold detailing...
Is that...that’s not...is that a... Yes...it's a WAND!
CAMERA FINDS the LITTLE HOMIE. Now across the street, he everything. He turns and runs up the block at full speed.
Pollard, the dick cop from earlier, Hicks and Ward all st at the wand on the kitchen table. Sergeant Ching enters..
There’s a blood trail leaving the property. Smells weird like gasoline.
Gasoline? Jesus Christ, what bleeds gasoline, what's that mean?
The blood trail belongs to our bright. Whatever went down, he gets shot and bailed out back without his wand.
Why aren't we evacuating the neighborhood? Remember how all those people died when the kids in Philly found a wand?
That was before Twitter. We don’t want to start a panic. You said the elf kid used the wand?
The kid’s not a bright. The wand just went off or something.
What’s the kid saying?
The kid isn’t saying shit, she’s freaked out. Plus she doesn’t speak English, only Elvish.
Ever seen a wand in person?
What? Sure ... yeah. That broken one in the Smithsonian.  29.
So what are we gonna do about this?
Secure the scene until the feds show up. This is way above our paygrades.
I didn’t call the feds. Pollard, you call the feds?
Nope. Pollard, Sgt. Ching and Hicks exchange looks. Ward beginn to clock something’s wrong.
What are we talking about here, guys. C’mon. Sarge? Sgt. Ching just stares with her cold black eyes. Then...

(screaming)

BLUE FIRE ERUPTS FROM THE WAND TOWARDS THE WITCH! She swa it away like a tennis ball and makes a yanking motion... Pulling her wand towards her, jerking Tikka towards the Witch. Jakoby and Ward grab Tikka...
The wand! Get the wand! Both men grab for the wand with frantic hands. Jakoby get his hands around it just as Tikka loses her grip and fall the side...  82.
I got it I got it! Ward gets a hand on it too. Now the two of them go for a ride, as if pulled by a tractor...

She gets it we're dead! They hold on for life. Their boots sliding over the pavement. An insane game of tug of war. Blood drips down Ward’s gunshot arm. Jakoby’s battered body creaks. He GROANS in pain... Their hands wrapped tightly around the wand -- The wand cutting into their palms, blood leaks out over their knuckles...

Bro, don’t let go. We go and we’re dead! Jakoby ROARS like a lion at the Witch, blood streaming do his face... The Witch laughs as she drags them closer and closer. FUC THEY ARE FUCKED! Ward slides a hand towards his gunbelt. Pivots his tazer in its holster... BAM! -- Fires blind from the hip -- Tazer darts hit the w in the neck. Her body goes RIGID as the tazer pumps high voltage into her... She releases the wand from her spell -- Ward and Jakoby tumble backwards to the ground in a jumble. Jakoby finds himself staring at Poison’s dropped machine gun -- “Yes!” Jakoby grabs the ugly black weapon and comes up firing... BRDDDDDT! -- His shots go wide, shredding cars. CAR ALARM scream out in the night...

Jakoby aiming carefully -- BRDDDDDT! -- Slugs smash into Witch. Splattering black blood in all directions! The Wit drops. Jakoby out of ammo... Now the Witch slowly stands. HOLY SHIT SHE'S STILL ALIVE! She SHRIEKS and summons her wand!

The wand, the wand!  83. Ward, on the ground, is brutally dragged across the pavem towards her. Metal on his belt throwing sparks... Jakoby thinks fast. He grabs a heavy steel truck rim from pile of tires. Hurls it with all his heart and might... ON THE WITCH -- Grinning with evil delight -- Here comes prize, her wand. She's winning... K-TANG! -- The rim crushes her head against an old truck a burst of black goo. She drops lifeless... The wand instantly goes slack to Ward’s relief. Jakoby fa against a car. Slumped there in a symphony of car alarms.

Good looking out, partner. They reach out pathetically to bump fists and give up. Wa flops over. His uniform torn, road-rash over half his bod He lifts the wand in his hand, stares at it, then looks o to the dead witch, then to Jakoby...
Where's Tikka? Jakoby and Ward look around -- THEY REALIZE TIKKA IS GONE
Why would she run? Where would she go?
She's just a kid. Only one place she’d go. Ward pulls himself up against a car, wincing...
She's going home, Nick. The silence hangs. Jakoby speaks quietly.

We could leave. The binding spell’s off the wand right? ‘Cause the witch is dead? We can’t run and can’t hide. Consequences or not, we gotta get to a hospital, man. And get out of this fucking neighborhood.
Yeah. But we’re not gonna.  84. Ward spits blood, wipes his drawn, pallid face.

My dad ran out on me. And Sophia’s dad ran out on her. Everywhere you look it’s people giving up and running away. (beat) Someone’s gotta do it. Someone's gotta be the good guy. A long pause. Then Jakoby nods. He's in. Both men haul themselves to their feet. One last time...

It’s quiet. Dead quiet... CAMERA SLOWLY REVEALS -- A dead SWAT COP. Then another. A another. And another. All the SWAT Cops are dead, shot to pieces. All killed in a vicious gunfight. CAMERA FINDS BROWN -- Crawling to his car, dying from gunshots. He SEES two figures approaching. Ward and Jakob emerge from the night mist like zombies...

...not you assholes... He tries to draw his pistol. Ward easily takes it away. N Jakoby and Ward watch in total silence as Brown dies. THEN A NOISE FROM THE HOUSE -- Ward nods for Jakoby to pi up a SWAT shotgun. He does. Ward and Jakoby approach the house. Limping up the porch stairs, Ward motions for Jako to go around the side... As Jakoby slips along the side, WE SEE something he doesn Slasher, holding a rifle, watching him from the shadows..
Ward moves very slowly, clearing the house. Now in the living room -- There's Cowboy dead in a pool of blood...

A NOISE from the kitchen. Ward heads toward it... NEW ANGLE -- Gibson standing there breathing softly. Hidd by a bookcase. She’s looking at Cowboy. Who looks back. He's not dead. Despite heavy injuries, he rises to his fe  85. Together they close in on Ward...
Jakoby moves toward the back yard. Quiet deliberate steps Slasher starting to follow...

FROM A LOW ANGLE -- We watch Ward enter the kitchen... REVERSE -- Tikka’s curled up under the sink, hidden by so pots. She waves gently. Trying to get Ward’s attention. H doesn’t see her... ON GIBSON -- Moving almost spectrally as she glides forwa Trying to get an angle on Ward... CLOSE ON WARD -- He can’t see her. But he pauses. Biting his lip. Maybe he feels a change in air pressure or

something. Ward suddenly spins around -- Cowboy is right there! POP-POP! -- Ward hits Cowboy in the face. Dropping him. N Ward spots Gibson! But she has the drop on him. Her carbi aimed at his face... But Ward has skills -- He jukes, spins and fires -- POP-P

Ward is hit in the chest. Gibson once in the face. Both o them fall. Tikka SCREAMS and bursts from her hiding place with a CLATTER of pots... BAM! -- Gibson shoots Tikka in the back! -- Sending her spinning into the cupboards...
Nooooo! Tikka writhes in pain on the linoleum -- Ward raises his at Gibson. And hesitates... Because Gibson has her carbine trained on Tikka...
Don’t. Jakoby appears in the big hole in the wall -- Shotgun aim at Gibson...  86.
Wait wait wait! Nick wait! Jakoby SEES the jeopardy that Tikka is in. Sees the state Ward, he’s bad. Real bad. Gibson slowly pushing herself t her feet, keeping her gun on Tikka...
She just shot a kid Scott.
Yeah. And she’ll do it again. Gibson SEES Slasher sneak past the kitchen window, moving flank Jakoby. Her eyes flick to Ward...
Drop your weapon. No way Ward will do that. Gibson looks at Tikka, finger o the trigger...

This trigger has a four pound break. Maybe you’ll destroy my brain stem with a perfect shot. But the girl will still die. Ward glares at her -- She’s being covered by Jakoby -- So tosses his gun away...
Bro. Don’t. Shit.
Get up. Go to the table. Ward, in excruciating pain, plants his feet and drives himself slowly up the wall...
You're crazy. You’re a fucking animal. Jakoby staring down his sights at Gibson. Hyper focused.
Please. Sit down. Take a moment to think about what you’re doing. Ward staggers to the table, slowly sinks into a chair.
Where is the wand?
What the fuck are you?
(after a long beat) I represent a larger interest. One that watches. And waits. For opportunities and capitalizes on them. The wand is an opportunity. (beat) You're going to give me the wand.
And then what?
I’m going to kill you and your orc friend. I’m going to walk out of this house. I’m going to work out and train and wait for my next assignment.
Right. 87. Suddenly they hear a storm of TRUCK ENGINES AND SCREECHIN TIRES out front...

SIX BLACK SUVs swarm the property. Kandomere and Gordon Vance pop out with a dozen hi-tech SPECIAL OPERATORS, everyone armored and tooled up for a firefight... Kandomere regards the house a beat. His eyes go wide.
There’s a bright in the house.
You sure? How do you know?
Have I been wrong yet? Vance turns to his men as they form assault teams.
It’s confirmed a bright’s in there. Kill everything that moves. An Assault Team heads for the back of the house.  88.
Ward heard them. Gibson heard them...
So ... do you have a new plan? Gibson doesn’t waver. Tikka moaning in pain on the floor. Ward slides a hand towards the pocket on his thigh where wand is stashed...
The second she lowers that gun even an inch you kill her Nick.
Roger that, partner. Gibson regards Jakoby. Looks back at Ward. SEES Ward now holds the wand...
Interesting. Now put it down.
No.
You're either born a bright or you study for years. Are you a bright? No. Do you know any spells? No. Try to use that wand and it will kill you.
Shut up.
There’s no way out. Give me the wand while this little creature is still breathing.
Nick. Get Tikka out of here.
No, Orc. You don’t move. Jakoby, still aiming his gun at Gibson, slowly moves into kitchen, towards Tikka...
Don't move another fucking inch.  89. Jakoby stops. The shotgun shakes in his hands...
Nick. It’s okay. Get Tikka.
What are you doing, Scott?
It’s gonna be okay.
Listen to your Orc.
What are you doing? Ward smiles at his friend. Quietly...
It’s like you said. It’s a prophecy. It’s all a prophecy.
You really believe that?
No. So I need you to believe it for me. (then) Get Tikka out of here.

You'll do no such thing. (to Ward) Imagine sitting in front of a candle day and night for years. Learning the stillness of mind a wand requires. Years of repeating the same spells. Precise articulations of ancient word forms. Tikka, looking at Gibson, realizes something. At the same time Ward does...
..-you’re a bright... NEW ANGLE -- Slasher steps through the hole into the kitc Weapon trained on Jakoby. Softly whispers...  90.
Easy friend. I got the drop on you. Let’s not have any mistakes here. I need you to slowly lower your weapon. Jakoby knows he fucked up...
What do I do?
Don’t you dare lower that shotgun. Gibson takes a step towards Ward...
Stop.
«--Scott..?
The Assault Team creeps up -- THEY SEE Slasher in the kit through the hole in the wall...
Gibson's eyes bore in on Ward...
It’s over. It’s hopeless.

POP-POP! -- Slasher is shot in the back by the Assaulters Jakoby fires his shotgun at Gibson -- KABOOM! .+.Just as Slasher falls onto him, knocking his aim askew «+.-so he only blows out a chunk of wall by Gibson’s head Who swings her carbine from Tikka to Ward...

head_text.subj: WARD SPRINGS TO HIS FEET AND SCREAMS

text: gl. THE FUCKING ROOM EXPLODES INTO LIGHT. The wand BLOWS APAR

head_text.subj: INTO A FOUNTAIN OF FIRE, VIOLENTLY LAUNCHING WARD BACKWAR

text: A LIQUID INFERNO OF LIGHT splashing in all directions.

head_text.subj: BLOWING APART GIBSON INTO A SCREAMING FLAMING SKELETON

text: LIGHT AND FIRE EXPLODE OUT THE WINDOWS -- Vance and the o operators dive to the ground. ON KANDOMERE -- He doesn’t flinch. Even as the shockwave blows back his clothes...
THE KITCHEN LOOKS LIKE LITERAL HELL -- Everything engulfe fire... Jakoby sees Slasher is still alive. Taking aim at him. Jakoby fires -- Buckshot knocks Slasher into the flames.
Scott! Scott where are you!? Nothing. He SEES Tikka unconscious on the floor. Jakoby lifts her, he staggers to the front door...
Jakoby stumbles out of the house with Tikka in his arms. Towards a jittery firing squad of Special Operators!
BRDDDDT! -- Gordon opens fire, Kandomere with his Elvin reflexes shoves his gun down just in time... Jakoby stumbles and drops to his knees...

Help the child! Jakoby is surrounded. Tikka is immediately taken away fro him, rushed to the PARAMEDICS. FIRE ENGINES arrive... Jakoby is clearly dazed, barely able to stand, but he man to get up -- He’s headed back towards the house...  92. Across the street -- The intimidating Orcs of the Fogteet Gang have gathered to watch... Kandomere blocks Jakoby’s path... KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Stop. We got you. It’s safe now.
You don’t understand, there’s a prophecy. This is part of something bigger...

Calm down. I know it’s something bigger. But you need to calm down. The house is now a complete inferno -- And Jakoby is will to walk right back in. Kandomere won’t allow that... Jakoby looks around, dazed. PEOPLE have finally come out their homes. Now liberated from the predations of the Altamira Gang. Sensing something special has happened...
Please listen, listen to me. He saved me and the girl, you can’t just let him burn. Gordon Vance helps out...
Sir, you need you need medical help.
He’s my best friend! My best friend, let me in there! Scott! Hey Scott! That’s my best friend! Jakoby collapses. Kandomere and Vance trying to keep him seated. Quietly now:
«+. my best friend. Please. That's my best friend....
It’s over. You have to accept it. It’s over. Jakoby stares at the house and shudders in anguish. Heartbroken. Tears roll down his face...  93. KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Breathe. You need to breathe.
You’re an elf you can hear in there. Tell me he’s dead. Tell me he’s really dead. Kandomere turns and looks back at the house, focusing. Th falters. And Jakoby sees it...
What did you hear?
He's dead. Jakoby stares at him, searching his face. Then:

You're lying! Tapping into some reserve of incredible strength, Jakoby shoves Kandomere off him! He's up and stumbling into the burning house before anyone can stop him -- Kandomere can only watch. So brave. So pointless...

Jakoby enters, coughing, choking on dense smoke. EVERYTHI BURNS. The ceiling falling around him. Glass breaking... He searches fruitlessly for Ward -- EVERYTHING IS JUST FI Too disorienting and bright. He’s being cooked alive! A SECTION OF WALL COLLAPSES -- Revealing Ward curled up i corner. Jakoby staggers to him, throws an arm around, hef him over his shoulder...

Jakoby and Ward COME CRASHING out the window, slamming in the ground as fire erupts from the doors and windows! The CROWD GASPS -- Now yelling and cheering... Jakoby drags Ward across the yard. Finally collapsing nex to him. Ward looks ... dead.
You’re out, you’re out of there, I got you. I got you. You’re okay.. (MORE )
Be okay. Just be okay. Breathe. Please breathe! C’mon Scott say something, say... Ward’s eyes are fixed in the distance, past Jakoby. Ward weakly points...

«+. Nick ... look... Jakoby does. And SEES the Fogteeth Orcs standing behind police lines. He just stares at them, uncomprehending... Then Dorghu steps forward and draws his ceremonial dagger He cuts his own paw and raises his clawed hand high. Then all the Orcs behind him raise their hands too... Jakoby watching this -- HE’S BEEN BLOODED -- Overcome wit emotion, he starts to cry...
Hey, Scott, we’re gonna be okay. Everything's ... Scott? Ward is done.
CLOSE ON SOMETHING BROWN -- Unclear what. A vortex of som kind. A spiral. WE SLOWLY REALIZE IT’S HAIR. We’re ina POV shot of someone’s hair. There’s FAINT BEEPING...

Ward is in a hospital bed with someone else’s hair next t his face. It’s SOPHIA! She’s crawled into the hospital be with him. She’s asleep. Ward is heavily bandaged, pale, hooked up to machines. Everything's blurry and confusing. He looks down at Sophi and buries his face in her hair, tears streaming down his face. He didn't believe he'd get this moment... Sophia hugs a piece of paper. Ward reaches for it. Slides it out of her arms. Looks at it. Chokes with emotion... It's her crayon drawing of Ward and Jakoby... An ELVEN NURSE enters. Checks numbers on machines. SEES He’s conscious. Checks his pulse. All business...
...where’s my partner..?  95.
Please don’t talk.

.-.-where is he..? She SNICKS back the curtain between the beds... REVEALING JAKOBY in the adjacent bed -- Equally beat to h Ward smiles... Jakoby looks over at him. His broken face smiles back. Th try to bump fists -- CLACK-CLANG -- They’re handcuffed to their beds! Now Ward SEES the FEDERAL MARSHALS in SWAT ge guarding them...
How fucked are we? Jakoby just shakes his head gravely -- It’s really bad...
Outside their room Kandomere talks to a Marshall. He gets call and steps aside to take it...
Any luck?
Three TECHNICIANS cluster around a monitor. The Drive fro the Surveillance Van on their table...
We got something. Not much but we got something.
How much is something?
Thirty three seconds.
What value is thirty three seconds?
You'd be surprised.  96. He pushes play and holds the phone to the speaker as vide from INSIDE THE KITCHEN AT 341 ABRAMS plays...

... the Department knows fuck all about the wand. If they did the whole world would be here. The wand doesn’t exist. The wand was never here. We’re taking the wand. Kandomere listening to the rest. Amazed...
Kandomere enters. Looks at the Jakoby and Ward. At these two incredible brave men. He's proud to know them... Kandomere unlocks Ward’s cuffs. Then frees Jakoby. The Marshall's see that...
Whoa. What the hell are you doing? Those guys are cop killers.
No. They’re not. They’re the good guys. Ward and Jakoby trade looks. Not fully understanding, but they know everything will somehow be okay. They reach out each other and shake... SLAM TO BLACK.
Tikka sits staring at a candle. Reciting magical incantations -- Training for what's to come... --The End--
